channel.title: Solid-State Batteries on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Solid-State Batteries on FinanClub

item.title: QS
item.description: score:-113 Chances: QuantumScape’s solid-state battery cells have shown a lot of promise so far. Investors are seeing the bright side in the electric vehicle space. The company has a pretty big lead over others developing solid-state batteries. Risks: A report suggests QuantumScape’s key partner could be looking for other sources of solid-state batteries.
